9e4d64e6faa80ae30a9d09ffee13ca7ab205b35c.commit.message:
Changed the behavior of the UserDatabase and GroupDatabase classes so that the save/delete methods are atomic. Consequently, the commit() methods in these classes are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. The reason for this change is simple: the commit() methods made no sense and were never used. Also, added a new method, rename(), that permits renaming of profile login names. References to commit() were removed from all classes, including test classes.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@626339 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
